title: Algebraic Aspects of Bethe-Ansatz
abstract: In these lectures the introduction to algebraic aspects of Bethe Ansatz is given. The applications to the seminal spin 1/2 XXX model is discussed in detail and the generalization to higher spin as well as XXZ and lattice Sine-Gordon model are indicated. The origin of quantum groups and their appearance in CFT models is explained. The text can be considered as a guide to the research papers in this field.
